message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value. However, this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price. I could consider letting it go for $1,050,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,000,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,025,000?
